questionsData.title: The bite of the bee is called sting.
Water is one of the substances that can be found in three states.
Convex lens makes objects larger.
questionsData.explain_answer:
Yes , A convex lens makes objects look larger and farther away. Convex lenses correct farsightedness.

ًWhile A concave lens makes objects look smaller and closer.

questionsData.title: Ultrasound can be heard by humans.
It had been noticed that people working with cows suffer from smallpox.
questionsData.explain_answer: It had been noticed that people working with cows not suffer from smallpox.

questionsData.title: Lunar eclipse happens when the sun moves between the earth and the moon.
Twins are people with different ages.
The countryside is the opposite of towns and cities.
questionsData.explain_answer:
Countryside : It is the area with low population density.


Towns and Cities : are the area with high population density.

questionsData.title: Foals feed from their mothers.
questionsData.explain_answer:
True
Foals, which are young horses, naturally feed from their mothers after birth. They rely on their mother's milk for nourishment during the early stages of their life. This milk provides the essential nutrients needed for growth and development until they are ready to start eating solid food.

 

صحيح – المهرات، وهي صغار الخيول، تتغذى على حليب أمهاتها بعد الولادة. يعتمد المهر في هذه المرحلة المبكرة من حياته على حليب الأم للحصول على التغذية اللازمة للنمو والتطور، حتى يصبح قادرًا على تناول الطعام الصلب.

questionsData.title: Sensible and silly are synonyms.
"Marriage ceremony" is " marriage party".
Hold and throw are synonyms.
"Radio stations were flooded with calls" means "too many calls".
Weekends and holidays have different meaning.
Post and job are antonyms.
Informal is business like.
To create something is to invent something new.
"Harvest" means "to take from trees"
Telescopes are used to watch stars.
Obeying the orders is mutiny.
The text is mainly talking about ……
questionsData.article:
Experiments have shown that some animals have a very good sense of direction. The Monarch butterfly is a good  example of this. The Monarch butterfly is a beautiful orange, and black color butterfly. It is a quite large butterfly.
However, it is only an insect with a very small brain. In spite of that, each year thousands of Monarchs fly from Mexico to Northern United States and Canada and back again. (It 3) is a remarkable trip, especially because it  takes several generations. The butterflies that spend the winter in Mexico (start 2) moving north in early spring.
(Within 1) two months, those butterflies lay eggs and die. The next generation is born and continues travelling  north. This may happen one or more times before the butterflies reach their summer home. The butterflies born in  early fall are different from the others. These butterflies live for seven months or more and fly all the way back
down to Mexico

questionsData.title: …….. sandwiches that my mother makes are delicious.
questionsData.explain_answer:
The best option to fill the blank is: The.

Here's why:

  • "The" is a definite article used to refer to specific things that have already been mentioned or are understood by the context.
  • "A" is an indefinite article used to refer to nonspecific things.

In this sentence, we are most likely talking about specific sandwiches that the speaker's mother makes regularly. Since these sandwiches are already familiar to the listener (the mother's sandwiches), "the" is the most appropriate choice.

questionsData.title: Which of the following words is a compound?
questionsData.explain_answer:
A compound word is a word that is formed by combining two or more separate words together to create a new word with its own meaning..

Some examples of compound words include:

  1. Football (foot + ball)
  2. Blackboard (black + board)
  3. Sunflower (sun + flower)
  4. Raincoat (rain + coat)
  5. Firefly (fire + fly)

questionsData.title: He plays chess worse than me. The word "worse " is a / an…
questionsData.explain_answer:
Here's why:

  • Adverbs modify verbs, adjectives, or other adverbs. In this sentence, "worse" modifies the verb "plays." It tells us the degree to which he plays chess.
  • Adjectives modify nouns. "Worse" does not modify a noun in this sentence, so it can't be an adjective.

questionsData.title: The stem of the word " unbelievable" is ……
On the pH scale, the lower the number, the . . . the acid.
questionsData.explain_answer:
On the pH scale, the lower the number, the stronger the acid

  • Stronger is a comparative adjective that indicates the degree of strength. In the context of the sentence, we're comparing the acidity based on the pH number. Lower numbers indicate a higher concentration of hydrogen ions, which makes the acid stronger.
  • Strongly is an adverb and wouldn't be grammatically correct in this sentence.
  • Strong could technically work, but it's less descriptive than "stronger" which emphasizes the comparison between different pH levels.
  • Strongest is a superlative adjective and wouldn't be appropriate here since we're not necessarily talking about the absolute strongest acid possible, just the relative strength based on the pH value.

questionsData.title: Those two buildings are…….height.
The farmer turns……the soil with his tractor
The shirt …… I bought yesterday is white.
………. Waleed was sick, he played football with his brother.
I can read your writing easily because it is very ……
questionsData.explain_answer:
• An adjective describes a noun or pronoun. In the sentence "I can read your writing easily because it is very neat," "neat" describes the quality of "writing."
  • adverb : While "neatly" can be used as an adverb modifying a verb like :  I find your writing very easy to read because it's written very neatly.
  • In this specific sentence, an adjective neat is the better choice.
